text: Paudie Lynch (born 1952 in Beaufort, County Kerry) is a former Irish Gaelic footballer. He played for his local club Beaufort and was a member of the Kerry senior inter-county team from 1972 until 1982. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Beaufort Gaelic footballers Category:Gaelic football backs Category:Kerry inter-county Gaelic footballers Category:Munster inter-provincial Gaelic footballers Category:Winners of five All-Ireland medals (Gaelic football)
title: Paudie Lynch
